TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IFieldTemplateFactory

summary.span: 定義由建立欄位樣板 (Template) 的物件所實作的介面。

span.span: Defines an interface implemented by objects that create field templates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別必須實作若要建立欄位樣板的類別。This class must be implemented by the class in order to create a field template. 這個介面會提供方法，初始化並建立欄位樣板。This interface provides methods that initialize the and creates field templates.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Web.DynamicData.IFieldTemplate CreateFieldTemplate (System.Web.DynamicData.MetaColumn column, System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControlMode mode, string uiHint);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.DynamicData.IFieldTemplate CreateFieldTemplate(class System.Web.DynamicData.MetaColumn column, valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControlMode mode, string uiHint) cil managed
Public Function CreateFieldTemplate (column As MetaColumn, mode As DataBoundControlMode, uiHint As String) As IFieldTemplate

public: System::Web::DynamicData::IFieldTemplate ^ CreateFieldTemplate(System::Web::DynamicData::MetaColumn ^ column, System::Web::UI::WebControls::DataBoundControlMode mode, System::String ^ uiHint);
abstract member CreateFieldTemplate : System.Web.DynamicData.MetaColumn * System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControlMode * string -> System.Web.DynamicData.IFieldTemplate

param.name: column
param.span: 指定要用來顯示欄位範本的資料行。

span.span: Specifies the data column to use to display the field template.

param.name: mode
param.span: 指定欄位範本的顯示模式。

span.span: Specifies the display mode of the field template.

param.name: uiHint
param.span: 指定要使用的欄位範本。

span.span: Specifies the field template to use.

summary.span: 使用 類別、 類別和 屬性建立欄位範本的執行個體。

span.span: Creates an instance of a field template using the class, the class and property.

returns.span: 在類別中實作時的 物件執行個體。

span.span: An instance of a object when implemented in a class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 動態資料欄位範本會對應到資料模型中的資料類型的資料控制項的 ASP.NET 使用者控制項。ASP.NET Dynamic Data field templates are ASP.NET user controls that map data controls to data types in a data model. 欄位範本通常是衍生自，可讓您存取資料欄位、 資料行和資料模型中的中繼資料的類別。Field templates generally derive from , the class that enables access to data fields, data columns, and metadata in data models. 動態資料專案提供預設欄位範本，但您可以修改它們，或建立自訂欄位範本。Dynamic Data projects provide default field templates, but you can modify them or create custom field templates. 當 imlemented，這個方法會建立欄位樣板的資料行，資料行中，模式為基礎而屬性。When imlemented, this method creates a field template based on the data column, the mode of the data column, and the property. 您指定`uiHint`參數，如果您想要使用自訂欄位範本呈現資料。You specify the `uiHint` parameter if you want to render data using a custom field template.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Initialize(class System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel model) cil managed

param.name: model
param.span: 指定欄位樣板使用的資料模式。

span.span: Specifies the data model that the field template uses.

summary.span: 使用指定的資料模式，初始化 。

span.span: Initializes a using the specified data model.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 動態資料會使用欄位樣板來顯示個別資料欄位。ASP.NET Dynamic Data uses field templates to display individual data fields. 欄位範本通常會實作為資料模型中的資料類型對應至資料控制項中的個別欄位的使用者控制項。Field templates are typically implemented as user controls that map data types in a data model to individual fields in the data control. 這個方法會初始化類別，用來建立欄位樣板使用的資料模型的欄位樣板會使用。This method initializes the class, which is used to create field templates using the data model the field template will use.
